definition[0]: if a MUTUAL COMPANY, such as a life insurance company or a BUILDING SOCIETY, demutualizes or is demutualized, it obtains the agreement of the people who invest in it, or are insured by it, to become a LIMITED COMPANY with shareholders, listed on the stockmarket
example[0]: During the last decade, many building societies and life insurers demutualised and were floated on the stock market.
